A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic visually\, but the story\, plot holes\, useless subplots\, and tons of things that didn't make sense made it confusing to watch. A lot of the characters were mishandled. I'm not a die-hard Star Wars fan\, I just like good movies. Even if this movie had nothing to do with Star Wars\, it's still a poorly written movie.
